Name: froness
Description: The Froness are descended from families who settled the Canopian star systems in the first decade of colonization, and many of these regard themselves as the only true Magistracy nobility.
ReputationStatements: Are you sure you are working for us?
Ok, useful I suppose. Next time, Next time, do all that we are paying you for.
Ok, useful I suppose. Next time, Next time, do all that we are paying you for.
Our money spends the same as the others - just do your job 'Marshal'.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: Ok, useful I suppose. Next time, Next time, do all that we are paying you for.
BadFaithFailureStatements: Are you sure you are working for us, or just watching things burn?
